description: org wiki American_Sign_LanguageIn this kernel I demonstrate that deep learning can be used to interpret these signs. ASL possesses a set of 26 signs known as the American manual alphabet which can be used to spell out words from the English language. That is much better than random chance given that there were 26 different signs.
